description: Increases the bonus fish you get when fishing, regardless of fishing rod. Automatically gets consumed when you fish via `[PRE]fish`.
Increases the bonus mine you get when mining, regardless of pickaxe. Automatically gets consumed when you mine via `[PRE]mine`.
Increases the bonus crops you get when farming, regardless of hoe. Automatically gets consumed when you farm via `[PRE]farm`.
Increases the bonus game you get when hunting, regardless of rifle. Automatically gets consumed when you hunt via `[PRE]hunt`.
